title: 2015 Harrowing Skins are Here!! (Jinx, Panth and Nunu)

embed.description: BBRRRAAAIIINNNSSSS. The PBE has been updated! To kick off the 5.21 PBE cycle, today's update includes three new skins and more! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.

body:
ZOMBIE Nunu~

Slayer Jinx and Pantheon.

Looking alright so far. Hope they have some nice effects.

replies.body: They all look alright, but they are not Halloweenish at all.. Very disappointing :( The only one even close to Halloweenish is Zombie Nunu. But meh, maybe they have nice effects.

> [{quoted}](name=Blainezy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IXUdq6iU,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-13T20:15:39.717+0000)
>
> They all look alright, but they are not Halloweenish at all.. Very disappointing :( The only one even close to Halloweenish is Zombie Nunu. But meh, maybe they have nice effects.

Zombie Nunu is nice, but I actually think that other champions deserve Halloween skins much more, for example... Bard and Kha'Zix.

The other two skins don't even look like Halloween skins. Not to mention, Jinx already got a skin not a long time ago, a Chinese New Year skin. Why does she needs to have another skin in less than one year?

Yeah she did get one at the start of the year, so having another one so fast is a bit of a surprise... though Ahri got one at the start of the year and then a little bit ago as well as the same with Karma getting one last year and now just recently.  So they are kind of filling out some of these champs a bit much.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IXUdq6iU,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-10-13T20:21:08.318+0000)
>
> Yeah she did get one at the start of the year, so having another one so fast is a bit of a surprise... though Ahri got one at the start of the year and then a little bit ago as well as the same with Karma getting one last year and now just recently.  So they are kind of filling out some of these champs a bit much.

It was surprising that Ahri got 2 skins in less than one year, taking into account that she already got another skin on 2013. Ahri already has seven skins as of now.

I just hope that Jinx does not become another Ahri/Annie/Ezreal.
Oh god... I hope she doesn't.  Ezreal was like a joke for awhile, seriously getting a skin every other patch.
They are popular champs so people will buy skins for them. People vote with their wallets and riot plays off that.
Trash skins tbfh

The biggest disappointment I have ever had skin-wise.

Oh we have the entire range of mythology and spooky fantasy to pick? 

let's pick lame zombie slayer, the probably lamest thing ever in that regard. No one likes slayers for their look, but because cutting through zombies with a chainsaw is awesome when you have brain matter flying everywhere. Simply looking at them however has the appeal of watching paint dry, as it is only a visual change.

heck, Spiritfire brand is more Harrowing than all of those three skins together.
Even the Demon Vi skin has more Harrowing in it then Zombies.
smh fam.

Not gonna lie, I'm disappointed in the skins. The theme is *kinda* neat, but it doesn't really feel like a harrowing skin theme.  Demon Vi and Spirit Fire Brand scream harrowing, the slayers are just meh.  Zombie Nunu does look good, but rito pls.  Less zombie skins/themes

Kinda annoyed that Nunu's rigging is fine for him to get a decent looking skin, but Eve has to wait until she gets her relaunch which basically means she is never going to get anything worth noting.
I dunno, {{champion:28}}  safecracker skin was decent, but she could really use more love :(

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=IXUdq6iU,comment-id=00120000,timestamp=2015-10-13T21:57:10.336+0000)
>
> I dunno, {{champion:28}}  safecracker skin was decent, but she could really use more love :(

Safecracker was a mediocre 750rp skin, personally I didnt like it or twitch.  I want something with bells and whistles, something that makes me go HHNNNNGGG and throw my wallet at the screen.

I'm still waiting for christmas eve with icicle Q's, mini blizzard partiicle W, and christmas tree/bloody icicle Ult
Pantheon is getting a new skin and it's not a baker skin, wtf Rito?

I think they're waiting to do something big before giving him a baker skin.

Though if he doesn't have it by his rework, I shall join others in the complaint for lack of bakers in our league.
I have faith there's another update and you're saving the better skin for last <3 (pleaaase)

Holy shit, finally some interesting skins for Pantheon and Jinx. But it's not really Halloween-fitting thing. 
I don't know, I feel kinda conflicted. I mean, it's good that we don't receive the same greenish underworld skins every year, but they don't feel really Halloween-related.
It overall feels more like a post-apocalyptic theme.  The Zombie and the (Zombie) Slayers.
Could work well with the Vandal Skins.  Maybe even be a vs group skin.
Kinda eh about it i wont lie, {{champion:80}}  is alright and {{champion:20}}  looks great. {{champion:222}}  Didnt need to get another skin imo...

{{champion:222}} new skin...Yeah I'm not sure why they did this.  I guess because she only has 2 skins outside of her default and she's growing in popularity.

Pantheon was a surprise though.

RIP my hopes for a Cass or Azir Halloween skin. ):
Maybe next year.
OMG I was also  expecting a skin for Cassiopeia and Azir!
Skins are underwhelming, but not that bad just doesn't scream harrow.
I want that jinx one! :D

Has nothing to do with the Harrowing/Halloween. No one in the community asked for these skins. The NuNu skin is alright. The other two are fine but nothing screams Halloween/Harrowing about them. Riot let a lot of people down. Now they are going to try and sell these skins with a horrible zombie apocalypse concept with a featured gamemode. No one wanted it.

Honestly, I'm kind of upset that Nunu got a skin. 

He kind of needs an overhaul/VU before he gets a skin.

Guess that means his is far off.
Agreed...Willump is much too small while Nunu himself just looks ridiculous in proportions to other models in most of his skins. The two definitely need a VU and rework.
Dat recall animation...{{champion:80}} I'm spoiling you again damn it!
Zombie Nunu is pretty cool. The others weren't impressive.
But do they really say... Harrowing? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/n9bp1xVM-harrowing-skins-are-awesome-however
i like the panth one but thats it, still crossing my fingers for a bard skin
With the Vi, Brand, and Kassadin skins being so nice, these feel so underwhelming.

Jinx's looks alright; kind of a zombie apocalypse survivor theme going on.  Still, I much prefer Firecracker.

I don't really like any of them though.
Yasuo needs a Harrowing or a Snowdown skin
Hmm, I could see him more in Snowdown.  I mean, what do you want for Halloween, a Zombie Samurai? That seems weird.

Nunu's an awful disappointment

i think the slayer line is cool though
